seeds.title: Seed 1 - Lay of The Land
seeds.descriptionText:
17 total Unique Shards Needed to finish the race
7 needed as an individual to burn the Sealing Tree

DLC Gaols, Catacombs, Caves, and Demi-Human Marigga are now apart of the Checks Included

Custom Starting Classes with Unique Weapons, you are allowed to switch if something catches your eye while looting the seed

As a Reminder Messmer must be killed by at Least one player on a team

O Mother Checker was used Meaning the Emote 'O Mother' cannot be at Jori, Midra, PK, Sennsesax, Bayle, Messmer, Gauis

seeds.title: Seed 2 - Classified
seeds.descriptionText:
Put Week 1 Seed 2 rules here.

You can write as much as you want.
Line breaks work.
